content: **knitted hat in 1 strand drops fiesta and 2 strands drops kid silk the piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the rainbow reach mittens pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #rainbowreachhat drops design pattern fs-036 yarn group b + a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150 g colour 22 fairytale and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150 g colour 56 marzipan **needles** drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm **knitting gauge** 15 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch and 3 strands on needle size 5 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-18-rainbow-reach-mittens
